heading: personal lore
intro: the rough arc, then some details.

timeline.event: discovered effective altruism through an interest in animal rights.
started studying international relations in geneva. built ea group instead of attending lectures.
got funded at a bioethics summer academy. dropped out of university to professionalize community building.
rebuilt ea switzerland. ran 100+ interviews with senior policymakers on catastrophic risk decision-making.
organized side events at the biological weapons convention. started computational modelling of pandemic attention dynamics.
covid validated our focus on catastrophic risks. translated the momentum into a new vehicle.
co-founded the simon institute for longterm governance with max stauffer. initially focused on bio + ai.
chatgpt validated our focus on ai. went all in on ai governance.
team of 10, chf 5m+ raised. two trips to china. frontier ai diplomacy. founded fractalgva. applying for swiss citizenship.
